thread.title_full: ASAP Tickets 7000+ reviewed by ADESIDA/ADERINSOLA OLUWAFEYISAYO

author: ADESIDA/ADERINSOLA OLUWAFEYISAYO
title: ADESIDA/ADERINSOLA OLUWAFEYISAYO
text: I had never used a travel agent before. So I was doing everything but outright telling them I was worried they were a fraud. Took less than an hour to get through the whole process of finding and buying a ticket to Nigeria that was in my price range of 800 but not going to take long to get there( only 1 3hr layover). I got my e ticket 2 days after.
